title: Hour 1 - Pat Forde (04-17-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Pat Forde (04-17-20)
description:
Dan and the Danette's get ready for this weekend's premiere of The Last Dance, while Dan gives a unique opinion on the LeBron vs. Jordan debate. The G-League path to the NBA may become a new trend after yesterday's events, and Pat Forde stops by the show.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
